name: TheIrishDictionary
0:
”Alexa, ask the Irish Dictionary, what is the Irish for "happy"”
”Alexa, ask the Irish Dictionary, what's the Irish for "echo"”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the irish dictionary
des: Dia duit! This skill enables you to ask for the Irish translation of a word in English. It looks up the word's entry on Foras na Gaeilge's New English-Irish Dictionary at https://www.focloir.ie and plays you the Connacht pronunciation of the first entry in the dictionary.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
